014package org.microbean.producer;
015
016import java.util.SequencedSet;
017
018import org.microbean.bean.Aggregate;
019import org.microbean.bean.Assignment;
020import org.microbean.bean.AttributedElement;
021import org.microbean.bean.Request;
022
023/**
024 * An interface whose implementations {@linkplain #initialize(Object, Request) initialize} contextual instances.
025 *
026 * <p>{@link Initializer}s are subordinate to {@link Producer}s, typically operating on the contextual instances they
027 * produce.</p>
028 *
029 * @param <I> the type of contextual instance
030 *
031 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson" target="_top">Laird Nelson</a>
032 *
033 * @see #initialize(Object, Request)
034 */
035// Subordinate to Factory<I> (really to PostInitializer<I>). Normally applied to Producer<I> output.
036// Calls initializer methods and injects fields
037// Note that this deliberately extends Aggregate, providing access to dependencies.
038public interface Initializer<I> extends Aggregate {
039
040  /**
041   * A convenience method that assigns a contextual reference to each of this {@link Initializer}'s {@link
042   * org.microbean.bean.AttributedElement} instances and returns the resulting {@link SequencedSet} of {@link
043   * Assignment}s.
044   *
045   * <p>Typically there is no need to override this method.</p>
046   *
047   * @param r a {@link Request} that retrieves a contextual reference suitable for an {@link
048   * org.microbean.bean.AttributedType}; must not be {@code null}
049   *
050   * @return an immutable {@link SequencedSet} of {@link Assignment} instances; never {@code null}
051   *
052   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code r} is {@code null}
053   *
054   * @see #assign(java.util.function.Function)
055   */
056  public default SequencedSet<? extends Assignment<?>> assign(final Request<?> r) {
057    return this.assign(r::reference);
058  }
059
060  /**
061   * Returns an immutable {@link SequencedSet} of {@link AttributedElement} instances <strong>required for instance
062   * initialization only</strong>.
063   *
064   * <p>The returned {@link SequencedSet} may be, and often is, empty.</p>
065   *
066   * <p>Overriding this method is normal and expected.</p>
067   *
068   * <p>Any overrides of this method must return determinate values.</p>
069   *
070   * @return an immutable {@link SequencedSet} of {@link AttributedElement} instances; never {@code null}
071   *
072   * @see Aggregate#dependencies()
073   *
074   * @see #assign(java.util.function.Function)
075   *
076   * @see #initialize(Object, SequencedSet)
077   *
078   * @see AttributedElement
079   */
080  @Override // Aggregate
081  public default SequencedSet<AttributedElement> dependencies() {
082    return Aggregate.super.dependencies();
083  }
084  
085  /**
086   * Initializes the supplied contextual instance, possibly using the supplied {@link Request} to obtain supporting
087   * contextual references.
088   *
089   * <p>Typically {@link Initializer} implementations will perform <dfn>field injection</dfn> and then will call
090   * <dfn>initializer methods</dfn> on the supplied contextual instance.</p>
091   *
092   * <p>Normally there is no need to override the default implementation of this method, which calls the {@link
093   * #initialize(Object, SequencedSet)} method with {@link Assignment}s derived from this {@link Initializer}'s
094   * {@linkplain #dependencies() dependencies}.</p>
095   *
096   * @param i the contextual instance to initialize; may be {@code null}
097   *
098   * @param r a {@link Request} that can be used to acquire supporting contextual references; may be {@code null}
099   *
100   * @return the initialized instance, or a copy of it, or a stand-in for it
101   *
102   * @see #initialize(Object, SequencedSet)
103   */
104  public default I initialize(final I i, final Request<I> r) {
105    return this.initialize(i, this.assign(r));
106  }
107
108  /**
109   * Initializes the supplied contextual instance, possibly (often) making use of the supplied, dependent,
110   * contextual references.
111   *
112   * <p>Implementations of this method must not call {@link #initialize(Object, Request)} or an infinite loop may
113   * result.</p>
114   *
115   * <p>Typically {@link Initializer} implementations will perform <dfn>field injection</dfn> and then will call
116   * <dfn>initializer methods</dfn> on the supplied contextual instance.</p>
117   *
118   * @param i the contextual instance to initialize; may be {@code null}
119   *
120   * @param assignments a {@link SequencedSet} of {@link Assignment}s to be distributed appropriately among fields and
121   * initializer methods; must not be {@code null}
122   *
123   * @return the initialized instance, or a copy of it, or a stand-in for it
124   *
125   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code assignments} is {@code null}
126   *
127   * @see Producer#produce(Request)
128   */
129  public I initialize(final I i, final SequencedSet<? extends Assignment<?>> assignments);
130
131}
